ambivalent letter BH⇨F? not really: The rare cases can be explained with later sound shifts:

𐌳𐌰𐌲𐍃 𐌰𐍆𐌰𐍂𐍃𐌰𐌱𐌱𐌰𐍄𐌴 dags afarsabbate Tags after Sambet-(Tag) day after saturday: Sunday
